title: That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report CAOPC24-006, dated September 16, 2024 of the Chief Administrative Officer as follows: That respecting the appointment of the Commissioner, Municipal Operations for the City of Peterborough, staff be directed to proceed as outlined in Closed Session Report CAOPC24-006.
That By-law 24-071 - Being a By-law to confirm the proceedings of the Council at its meeting held on September 16, 2024, be approved.
That this meeting be adjourned at 5:47 p.m.
